company.description:
TRC Talent Solutions is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOE). All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by law.

At TRC, we take pride in fulfilling our opportunity to add value to our clients business as their staffing partner, while working tirelessly to connect thousands of individuals each year with work opportunities where they can meet the needs of their families and have the potential to build their careers.

jobDescription.text:
Here is the job description for the Bill Collector position:
Job Title: Bill Collector
 
Location: 30047 Lilburn GA USA
 
Employment Type: Temp to Hire
 
Job Description: We are seeking a motivated and experienced Bill Collector to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will play a crucial part in ensuring timely collections and maintaining positive customer relationships.
 
Roles and Responsibilities: - Contact customers via phone, email, and mail to collect outstanding payments - Negotiate payment arrangements and follow up on commitments - Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and payment histories - Collaborate with internal teams to resolve customer inquiries and disputes - Adhere to all applicable laws, regulations, and company policies - Contribute to process improvements to enhance collections efficiency
 
Roles and Responsibilities: - Contact customers via phone, email, and mail to collect outstanding payments - Negotiate payment arrangements and follow up on commitments - Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and payment histories - Collaborate with internal teams to resolve customer inquiries and disputes - Adhere to all applicable laws, regulations, and company policies - Contribute to process improvements to enhance collections efficiency
 
Experience Level: 3 to 5 years of experience in collections or a related field preferred
 
Company Description: At TRC, we take pride in fulfilling our opportunity to add value to our clients business as their staffing partner, while working tirelessly to connect thousands of individuals each year with work opportunities where they can meet the needs of their families and have the potential to build their careers. Join our team and make a positive impact while growing your career in collections. We offer a supportive work environment, opportunities for advancement, and competitive compensation. Apply today to take the next step in your professional journey!
 
Experience Level: 3 to 5 years of experience in collections or a related field preferred
 
Company Description: At TRC, we take pride in fulfilling our opportunity to add value to our clients business as their staffing partner, while working tirelessly to connect thousands of individuals each year with work opportunities where they can meet the needs of their families and have the potential to build their careers. Join our team and make a positive impact while growing your career in collections. We offer a supportive work environment, opportunities for advancement, and competitive compensation. Apply today to take the next step in your professional journey!
